name: send_payment_link
description: Send SMS with payment link to the customer's phone number. Call this function when the customer agrees to receive the payment link.

customer_confirmed.description: Whether the customer confirmed they want to receive the payment link

name: confirm_payment
description: Mark that the customer has confirmed they will make the payment. Call this when customer explicitly states they will pay.

notes.description: Any additional notes or comments from the customer

name: customer_disputed
description: Record when customer disputes the bill amount or claims they already paid. Call this to flag the bill for investigation.

payment_reference.description: Payment reference number if customer claims they already paid

name: schedule_callback
description: Schedule a callback when customer is not available or requests to be called later
